text:
Hi all. Shameless plug here… We are launching a new app that might be of interest to you.

<https://www.babelbot.app|BabelBot> performs automatic translation of incoming chats on your website and is plugged directly into HubSpot Inbox. We support over 60 languages and it takes less than 60 seconds to set up. We have a free trial available and a pay-as-you-go plan so that sites with any volume of multi-language conversations can support their customers around the world. We’d love any feedback you have!

Thanks! And back to your regularly scheduled programming.
<http://www.babelbot.app|www.babelbot.app>
